mapper.select: SELECT gpt.giving_page_id as page_id, gpt.giving_name as page_title, ct.center_id, ct.center_name, ct.center_address, ct.center_phone_number, ct.center_ceo, gpt.main_img_url as img_url, sum(gt.giving_total) as giving_total, gpt.story_title, gpt.story_content, gpt.category_id, gpt.goal_total, gpt.register_date, gpt.end_date, case when end_date < CURDATE() THEN '모금 종료' when end_date = CURDATE() THEN '오늘 모금 종료' ELSE DATEDIFF(end_date, CURDATE()) end AS d_day, gpsit.img_url as sub_img_url, round(SUM(gt.giving_total) / goal_total * 100) as achievement_rate FROM giving_page_tb gpt left outer join center_tb ct on (ct.center_id = gpt.center_id) left outer join giver_tb gt on (gt.giving_page_id = gpt.giving_page_id) left outer join giving_category_tb gct on (gct.giving_category_id = gpt.category_id) left outer join giving_page_sub_img_tb gpsit on (gpsit.giving_page_id = gpt.giving_page_id) WHERE gpt.giving_page_id = #{pageId}

select giving_page_id * FLOOR(RAND() * 10) as page_rand_index, giving_page_id as page_id, giving_name as page_title, main_img_url as img_url from giving_page_tb where not giving_page_id = 9 order by page_rand_index limit 0, 5;
mapper.update: update giving_page_tb set giving_name = #{pageTitle}, end_date = #{endDate}, giving_total = #{givingTotal} where giving_page_id = #{pageId};
mapper.select: SELECT user_tb.user_id, user_tb.name AS username, giver_tb.giving_page_id AS page_id, giver_tb.giving_total, giver_tb.giving_date FROM user_tb JOIN giver_tb on user_tb.user_id = giver_tb.user_id WHERE giver_tb.giving_page_id = #{pageId};
SELECT dup.content, dup.donation_expense FROM donation_use_plan_tb AS dup JOIN giving_page_tb AS gpt ON dup.giving_page_id = gpt.giving_page_id WHERE dup.giving_page_id = #{pageId};

SELECT tb.target, tb.target_count, tb.benefit_effect, tb.business_start_date, tb.business_end_date FROM target_benefit_tb AS tb JOIN giving_page_tb AS gpt ON tb.giving_page_id = gpt.giving_page_id WHERE tb.giving_page_id = #{pageId};
